title: Start
body:
And what happened next? Oh, it’s quite the delight— for YOU, dear player, have set things right! With presents returned and joy in the air, you’ve shown the true meaning of how much we care.
The Grinch’s heart grew, but let’s not forget, you’ve saved Christmas for Whos, both big and small!

The End!

[[Next Scene|Credits]]

title: Credits
body:
